metro.TrainManagement.Nodes

Class RailwayNodeOverseer

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.TrainManagement.Nodes.RailwayNodeOverseer

  • public class RailwayNodeOverseer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the RailwayNodes, offers some functions in adding, removing and clearing the map of nodes.
    Author:
    hauke

      • getNodeByPosition

        public static RailwayNode getNodeByPosition(java.awt.Point position)
        Gets the RailwayNode at a specific position.
        Parameters:
        position - The position.
        Returns:
        The node that should be found. "null" when no node exists.

      • isNodeAt

        public static boolean isNodeAt(java.awt.Point position)
        Checks if a node at a specific position exists.
        Parameters:
        position - The position to check on.
        Returns:
        True when a node exists, false if not.

      • doesExist

        public static boolean doesExist(RailwayNode node)
        Checks if an node already exists
        Parameters:
        node - The node that possibly exists.
        Returns:
        True when node exists.

      • add

        public static void add(RailwayNode node)
        Adds a node to the list of nodes (better: to the map).
        Parameters:
        node - The RailwayNode that should be added

      • removeNodesWithoutNeighbors

        public static void removeNodesWithoutNeighbors()
        Removes all nodes with no neighbors. These nodes are normally not visible and have no function.

      • drawAllNodes

        public static void drawAllNodes(java.awt.Point offset,
                com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch sp)
        Draws all nodes onto the sprite batch.
        Parameters:
        offset - The map offset in pixel.
        sp - The sprite batch.
